AuthnApiApplications.description: A collection of Authentication API Application items.

items.description: The actual list of Authentication API Applications.

id.description: The persistent, unique ID for the Authentication API application. It can be any combination of [a-zA-Z0-9._-]. This property is system-assigned if not specified.

name.description: The Authentication API Application Name. Name must be unique.

url.description: The Authentication API Application redirect URL.

additionalAllowedOrigins.description: The domain in the redirect URL is always whitelisted. This field contains a list of additional allowed origin URL's for cross-origin resource sharing.

fieldPath.description: The path to the model field to which the error relates, if one exists.

location.description: A read-only URL that references the resource. If the resource is not currently URL-accessible, this property will be null.

ApiResult.description: Details on the result of the operation.

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors, if any.

apiEnabled.description: Specifies whether the authentication API is enabled. The default value is false.

defaultApplicationRef.description: Application for non authentication policy use cases.
